protein.specific_function: May play a role in the terminally differentiating and the adult nervous system during postnatal development. Could stabilize interactions between hyaluronan (HA) and brain proteoglycans

reference.reference_text: Gary SC, Zerillo CA, Chiang VL, Gaw JU, Gray G, Hockfield S: cDNA cloning, chromosomal localization, and expression analysis of human BEHAB/brevican, a brain specific proteoglycan regulated during cortical development and in glioma. Gene. 2000 Oct 3;256(1-2):139-47.
